p: A bolus dose of SEA, SEB or SEB N23A (50 μg in 200 μL PBS) was administered intraperitoneally (i.p.) at indicated time points. In a limited number of experiments, mice were briefly anesthetized using 20% isoflurane before they were injected intranasally (i.n.) with 50 ng SEB in 25 μL sterile PBS. Control mice received an equal volume of PBS. MAM was injected i.p. at 50 ng in 200 μL of PBS containing 0.2% BSA.
